mapper.select: SELECT A.imedia, A.title, A.date , A.star, B.pic FROM t_media A JOIN t_media_pics B ON A.imedia = B.imedia WHERE A.iuser = #{iuser} AND A.date = #{date} AND A.del = 0 GROUP BY A.imedia

SELECT m.imedia, p.pic, m.date, c.mediaCnt from t_media m join t_media_pics p ON m.imedia = p.imedia LEFT JOIN ( SELECT imedia, COUNT(DATE) AS mediaCnt from t_media WHERE date_format(date, '%Y-%m') = #{ym} and iuser = #{iuser} and del = 0 GROUP BY date ) c ON m.imedia = c.imedia WHERE date_format(date, '%Y-%m') = #{ym} and m.iuser = #{iuser} and m.del = 0 GROUP BY m.date
mapper.update: UPDATE t_media SET del = 1 WHERE imedia = #{imedia} AND del = 0
mapper.select: SELECT A.imedia, A.title, A.date, A.star ,B.pic FROM t_media A JOIN t_media_pics B ON A.imedia = B.imedia WHERE A.is_saw = #{isSaw} AND A.iuser = #{iuser} AND A.del = 0 GROUP BY B.imedia
SELECT pic FROM t_media_pics WHERE imedia = #{imedia}
